Deerwood Country Club >Located in the southeast Jacksonville metro area off Interstate 95, Deerwood is Jacksonville's first gated country club community consists of approximately 900 residences, ranging from 5-acre estate homes to garden homes and townhouses. Deerwood has thousands of mature trees lining its country style lanes, numerous lakes and ponds, and strategically placed parks and traffic islands all meticulously landscaped. In addition to a 3-acre playground and park open to all residents from dawn to dusk, Deerwood is home of the Deerwood Country Club, Inc. which is also member owned and features an 18 hole golf course, fitness center, swimming pool, and tennis facility. See site map . Deerwood's proximity to downtown and the beaches makes it minutes from everywhere you want to be. Now with the addition of Tinseltown, fine dining, entertainment, and the area's finest shopping, Deerwood has become the most sought after place to live by Jacksonville's active professionals. The community features a country club lifestyle, plenty of fun in the sun and an excellent quality of life. The area offers residents friendly, family oriented communities with a wide array of homes, a good school system, a low crime rate and easy access to all the amenities of Jacksonville. While residents of Deerwood enjoy the quiet and serenity of their communities, Jacksonville proper is just minutes away, offering all the amenities of a major metropolitan area. The "First Coast" features miles of unspoiled beaches; ecological and nature based excursions; historical sites and architecture; sporting, gaming and cultural activities; unique shopping and dining; and numerous festivals and events. For a private tour and showing, please call (904) 307-8998 . If the listings above don't load, try allowing third party cookies or view listings here . About Us – Dellwood Country Club Members Area Contact Us How to Find Us 651-426-3218 Toggle navigation Our Story Membership Golf Tennis Pool Fitness Dining Weddings & Events Weddings Events & Banquets About Dellwood Our award winning championship course Explore Tailored to good times and great experiences with friends and family. A friendly and casual atmosphere in comfortable surroundings where members and their guests hang out and have fun enjoying the culture, amenities and activities that define Dellwood Country Club. Dellwood CC is privately owned with a vast array of amenities and member services. Our golf course is nationally ranked and our pool complex is, according to our members and their guests, “super cool” – not like a traditional country club!  We are classy and progressive – built to be fun for all who experience our Club. Dellwood CC provides exceptional experiences for members in an environment that encourages the formation of enduring friendships, by offering personalized service, outstanding facilities, and  a sustained commitment to quality and fun. Deerwood Public Golf Course and Country Club Golf at Deerwood Member Login Outings & Special Events Pro Shop Dining & Catering Pool & Tennis About Location ✕ About Our Club For Golfers Dining & Catering Welcome to DEERWOOD COUNTRY CLUB Deerwood Country Club offers a Carolina-style links experience in a breathtaking woodland setting. In addition to our stunning golf course, members and guests can access facilities for tennis, swimming, and fine dining. We pride ourselves on providing our members with outstanding service and an enjoyable experience on each and every visit. Our par-70 golf course is renowned for its impeccable grooming. We have four tee boxes to accommodate players of all levels, well-appointed locker rooms for men and women, and a fully stocked pro shop with a wide selection and friendly, attentive customer service. Not only do we offer tournaments and lessons, but we can also host private tournaments for your company or group. With amenities like these, it's no wonder that Deerwood is considered a haven for golfers. Open to members and guests, our spectacular 25-meter, five-lane pool is staffed with licensed water safety instructors and accentuated by a relaxing patio and cabana. Families can take advantage of swimming lessons, aqua exercise classes, and special events.

Adjacent to the pool, you'll find gated four-color coated hard tennis courts, ideal for casual competition or improving your game. Members and guests can sign up for both group clinics and private lessons with experienced instructors. 

When it's time to have a casual lunch or sit down for an elegant meal with fine wine, you'll find both in our wonderfully appointed dining rooms: the expansive Green Room, the intimate Garden Room, and the Deerwood Pub. In pleasant weather, relax with guests on the patio overlooking the 18th fairway. Book your Tee Time A golf experience to remember. Contact Us For Additional Information Your Name (required) Your Email (required) Subject Your Message Thank you for your interest in Deerwood Country Club. A representative from our club will review your message and contact you within 48 hours if required. For immediate information please call the club at: 609-265-1800. Memberships Available To learn more about becoming a member at Deerwood Country Club, or if you have any questions about any of the services we have to offer, call us at 609-265-1800 or email us at golf@deerwoodcc.com Powered by neKey

                                    Baths 2,252 SqFt Residential MLS® # 2076426 COLDWELL BANKER VANGUARD REALTY View All 11 Results More About Deerwood in Jacksonville, FL Deerwood offers stylish homes from traditional, modern, contemporary or mid-century; Deerwood has it all, including villas and townhomes. An established community that began construction in the late 60’s, Deerwood is now home to approximately 950 families. Its central location in the Southside area between Southside Boulevard and Baymeadows Road makes it highly sought after by those looking for interstate convenience via I-295 to the Beaches and I-95 to Downtown. If you’re looking for homes for sale in Deerwood you will find the neighborhood to be a well-thought country-style setting, with incredibly mature natural areas lining the streets, many ponds and lakes filled with beautiful nature and surrounded by the Deerwood Country Club golf course with the 25,000 square foot clubhouse at the communities center. The amenities available to residents of Deerwood include: Gated community with access control officers Three-acre playground and park Covered pavillion with kitchen open dawn to dusk Soccer field and basketball court (open year round) Deerwood country club in Jacksonville, FL Deerwood Country Club is a private member club with a history dating back over 60 years. Deerwood Country Club, located at 10239 Golf Club Drive Jacksonville, FL 32256, is a member-owned club with a member-elected board. Golf members are welcomed by PGA professionals offering instructional golf opportunities for members and guests on the Par 72 course, redesigned in 2004. In addition, Deerwood offers Har-Tru Tennis courts, a fitness center with strength training, and cardio equipment plus a 1,300-square-foot group fitness studio.  Swimmers will love the aquatics center with a junior olympic-sized swimming pool with year-round access. Other detailed features include: Award winning Par 72 golf course 12 Har-Tru tennis courts Fitness Center overlooking Lake Deerwood Spa service for massage, aesthetician, eyelash and steam room services Kids Club, child care, camps and activities Olympic size swimming pool and jacuzzi Children’s splash pool The Torpedoes Swim Team Swimming lessons for adults and children Full service, golf course view dining Private banquet rooms for meetings and events Interested in more information on membership? Contact the Membership Office at 904-641-6100 ext. 106. Deerwood country club culture Deerwood Country Club organizes events for the community throughout the year that can be found in the monthly Deerwood Living newsletter. Resident services put lots of thought into creating a sense of community and opportunities to meet your neighbors with activities through card groups, comedy nights, family game nights, trivia nights, wine nights, holiday events, and 4th of July fireworks to name just a few. Hear from Deerwood Residents Deerwood is one of the most established communities in Jacksonville and the first established gated community in the area. The neighborhood is naturally pleasant with ancient oaks and various landscaping lining the roadways and yards. The resident social scene and the community amenities complete the active lifestyle for those looking to know their neighbors and enjoy a community-oriented lifestyle. But, what’s it really like? If you are considering a move to Deerwood finding a home can be a not so easy task! Equally as hard is finding a family-oriented neighborhood that truly feels like home. We questioned a few residents of Deerwood to help create a picture of the community and help get a sense of what Deerwood is like from an “insider’s perspective.” Here’s what they had to say. Q: What do you LOVE about Deerwood? I love the older homes with a wide variety of styles, large plots of land with plenty of backyard space, and beautiful trees, that it’s a bit of a hidden gem right in the middle of town…most importantly, the people! Our neighborhood is going through a transition with so many young families, a lovely mix of out-of-towners and those who were born and raised here. – Kimberly A Q: What do people misunderstand most about Deerwood? There’s a bit of a misnomer that you have to move to St. John’s County for great schools. If you look at the rankings, many of Duval County schools are fantastic and the wide variety of great nearby private schools and early childcare are also not to be missed! – Kimberly A Q: Do you use the Deerwood Country Club? If so, what is most appealing to you about the club? Yes, we are members! The golf course is in great shape, with plenty of family-centric events, a kids club, and a fitness center! – Kimberly A Q: What DON’T people know about Deerwood? Deerwood was the first gated community in Jacksonville and developed by the very families that have played a significant role in developing the city. So I think if you know of Deerwood, you know it’s amazing. But many people simply don’t know about Deerwood. – Kimberly A Browse Other Florida Beach Communities We Serve Atlantic Beach Jacksonville Beach Neptune Beach Nocatee Ponte Vedra Beach South Ponte Vedra Contact The Volen Group today for help with your next home.
